usedBy.label: GBIF (Global Biodiversity Information Facility)
usedBy.description: GBIF — the Global Biodiversity Information Facility — is an international network and data infrastructure funded by the world's governments and aimed at providing anyone, anywhere, open access to data about all types of life on Earth.

usageDescription.description: ABCD is used by GBIF to standardize biological collection data across repositories and enable global data sharing.
